name: Dark Tales: Mirror and Mad Princess
storyline:
The world of fairy tales is torn apart and plunged into the boundary between light and darkness...

A brutal Snow White who kills her own stepmother, a wicked Little Red Riding Hood who wears the wolf's skin, and a short-tempered Little Prince — the images and stories of characters who appeared in various famous fairy tales are turned upside down!

Let's go to a wonderland full of mysteries where fantasy and cruelty coexist.
summary: A dark mobile RPG based on classic fairy tales.
